name: Cursed Forge - Radzo73's Dark CurseForge add-on
description:
This is NOT a full userstyle. I made this only to darken what Radzo73's Dark Curseforge doesn't. I've included in-line comments to label sections code.

Link to Radzo73's Dark CurseForge: https://userstyles.org/styles/158110/dark-curseforge-beta

Technically, I kinda stole CurseForge's CSS to tweak it, but that's a necessary evil, right?
I've probably missed some elements. I may or may not come back to this to work on it.

Credits:
Thank you Radzo73 for your rad UserStyle!
Thank you Curseforge for being an awesome host for an awesome community!
additional_info:
Changes:

Version 0.1.0 — Initial Release.
Version 0.1.1 — Missed a spot on the landing page. Fixed background and border color inconsistencies.
Version 0.1.2 — "Pages" section on Project would have a white header background. Changed to match overall background color.
